nycTheatreExcerpt: While fascinating in its ambition, pretty early the momentum of the play stalls, and Bug becomes an arduous descent into loud shouting and, ultimately, no answers. Coon and Smallwood's performances navigating this nightmare slalom are electric. The play, prophetically prescient as it may be, is not.
